title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: The ministry has organized the country into five regions with 5 Health Regional Councils (CRS) and 5 Regional Health Observatories (RHAs). At the Provincial level, there are 48 Directorates of Health and Population (one per province). The current minister is Abdelhak Saihi (since 9 September 2022).
